items.question: What is the monthly maintenance charge?
items.answer: Monthly maintenance charges vary based on the flat size. Please contact the management office for the exact amount applicable to your unit. Payments are due by the 10th of every month.

items.question: How can I pay my maintenance charges?
items.answer: Maintenance charges can be paid via bank transfer (NEFT/IMPS) or UPI. Account details are available at the management office. Please include your flat number as the payment reference.

items.question: How do I report a maintenance issue?
items.answer: Maintenance issues can be reported to the management office during office hours (Mon-Sat, 9 AM - 6 PM). For urgent issues outside office hours, please contact the security desk who will coordinate with the maintenance team.

items.question: What are the move-in/move-out procedures?
items.answer: Moving in or out requires prior notice to the management office (at least 48 hours). Moving activities are allowed only between 8:00 AM and 6:00 PM. A no-objection certificate (NOC) from the association is required for move-out.

items.question: Can I rent out my flat?
items.answer: Yes, flats can be rented out. However, tenants must be registered with the management office with proper documentation including rental agreement, ID proof, and police verification. The flat owner remains responsible for any violations by the tenant.

items.question: Is there a community hall available for booking?
items.answer: Yes, the community hall can be booked for private events and functions. Please contact the management office at least one week in advance. A refundable security deposit and usage charges apply.

items.question: What are the power backup arrangements?
items.answer: The complex has a generator backup for common area lighting, lifts, and water pumps. Individual flat power backup is not provided by the association.

items.question: How does water supply work?
items.answer: Water is supplied from the Cauvery connection and borewell. Regular supply is available during morning (6-9 AM) and evening (5-8 PM) hours. Overhead tanks ensure continuous availability for essential use throughout the day.

items.question: Are pets allowed in the complex?
items.answer: Pets are allowed with proper registration at the management office. Pet owners must provide vaccination records, keep pets leashed in common areas, and clean up after them. Pets are not permitted in the children's play area or community hall.

items.question: What should I do in case of an emergency?
items.answer: In case of emergency, contact the security desk immediately. Emergency numbers are displayed at the security gate and on the community notice board. For fire emergencies, use the fire extinguishers available on each floor and evacuate via stairways (do not use lifts).
